items.sentence: I asked Tom to stop doing what he was doing.

Your problem is that you give up too easily.

I hope that we don't lose you as a customer.
I'm sorry, but I can't answer that question.
Tom wouldn't do a thing like that, would he?
Tom and Mary told me exactly the same thing.
Tom and Mary are taking a walk on the beach.
Tom wasn't the one that discovered the body.

How were you all able to do that so quickly?
Tom should've asked for permission to leave.
